title: Mentor
description: U of T Co-op Student Association
overview: Mentor for Co-op Computer Science students
points: Provided mentor support for new students entering the Co-op program or first-time seekers with activities such as resume and interview prep, workplace experience and the co-op journey

title: Senior Library Volunteer/Assistant
overview: Assisted the librarian with the daily operations of the library such as organizing books and event planning
points: Organized and ran events to increase attendance of the library
Trained new members of the club
Assisted with daily adminstrative operations of the library

title: Club Secretary
overview: Member of 'Radio Monarch' - the club responsible for daily morning annoucements to the entire school
points: Collected messages from teaching and office staff
Provied guidance for new club members
